candle.bitcoin.explorer.esplora

Class EsploraFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • candle.bitcoin.explorer.esplora.EsploraFormatter

  • public class EsploraFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    A util class to help with formatting EsploraBlock data as a human readable string. It formats and converts the supplied data analog to the output seen on https://blockstream.info.

      • hex

        public static java.lang.String hex(int number)
        Formats a given int value as a hex string (i.e. 0x01). Makes sure that the resulting hex string does not consist of an uneven length, by adding a leading zero.
        Parameters:
        number - Number to be represented as a hex string.
        Returns:
        Formatted hex string (incl. "0x" appending).
